column5: I told my wife we need to get all spring things done because believe broader will open soon! As soon as it is we headed up. Keep pictures coming!
Canada.This is the public d√≥ck in Vermilion Bay.

So.. Where are you located?? I saw your pic's from Perrault Falls and these, makes me jealous as I have a cabin north of Sioux Narrows and get get over the border. Also have a couple of friends that own a resort in Perrault Falls and they are stuck here for the time being.
Live just off hwy 105 at red lake rd.near railway tracks
Made a trip to Vermilion Bay and went down to the dock for a look and a hike along the trail.
Its nice to see a lot of snow is gone.
In my minds eye I can see & hear the water lapping against the shoreline in Gods country.

Its finally starting to look like spring.Lots of ice yet.plenty of cool nights and below 0c.so not a lot of melting overnight and takes a long time to start melting in daytime.Forcast is also for cooler temps and freezing over night.But it will be like normal ice out around may 6-7.i hope,season or no season looking forward to sitting back in my boat.
We have a plan to head out fishing on Friday. Another good looking day with minimal wind so will take advantage of that.ill see if i can get some video of moving water and sound for ya.lol.
John if you don't find any moving water just let nature call that will move some water or coffee but pls don't film it lol.
Haha.ill try to stick to the natural stuff.
thats your job now john keep the pics coming nothing to look forward to all day but your pics or maybe a video,much easier to social distance where u live than here keep safe,rod
Definatly trying.seems the east is the worst but thats where the big populations are.Hopefully all this self distancing starts to level off.
Is trhis the Eagle lake that is in canada or the the that is in the Satates ??
